title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Start from scratch Airbus A320
description:
In this how to we are going to look how we can start the Airbus A320 from scratch including programming the MCDU based on a flight plan created with Simbrief.

To make somethings easier I have used the a32nx mod which can be downloaded from the site below:
https://github.com/flybywiresim/a32nx
